item.title: The Jabra SPEAK 810 can detect and track people speaking from several meters away
item.description:
Fragment.in, a Swiss design interaction studio, created a computer orchestra controlled by gestures. Hand movements are recognized by a Kinect, which then controls audio from multiple computers. The sound is emitted through Jabra SPEAK 810 devices. Jabra, a company specializing in audio and communications technology, has launched the SPEAK 810. This new conference speakerphone offers high-quality call experiences to enhance meeting collaboration. Retailing at US$599, the Jabra SPEAK 810 addresses common obstacles to effective collaboration...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-jabra-speak-810-can-detect-and-track-people-speaking-from-several-meters-away/
